post.content:
Halo Everyone!

Come learn about what Model U.N. has to offer and what makes it a unique opportunity! Our interest meeting is next Thursday, September 29th, in room 335 at 3:35. We meet every Monday and Thursday at room 335 at 3:35. Pop by our interest meeting, or join our Stuyactivies group and our Facebook! You can also email us at stuymunc2022@gmail.com about our miniMUNC conference for Stuyvesant Model UN novices!

StuyMUN is a no cuts, no tryouts club, and we highly suggest you join! All signups are non-binding.

We meet Monday and Thursday. We hope to see you there!!

StuyMUN Club
post.title: Welcome Novices!
